duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare and prosecute criminal cases before the courts under the supervision of the District Attorney or his designee.
Appear in court and prosecute cases at hearings, trials, and/or Grand Jury.
Conduct legal research, prepare cases, and advocate in the courtroom.
Ensure compliance with all legal and ethical standards in the prosecution of cases.
Assist in refining legal strategies and contributing to successful case outcomes.

education_certification.credential: Graduation from an American Bar Association accredited law school.
